logic

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    A piece for a game of chess. This is the abstract class for defining a chess-piece, containing all methods to be implemented or inherited.
    Author:
    Moritz Rehschuh

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Pos myPosition
      The position of this piece.
      private Player Owner
      The Player who owns this piece.

      A Getter-method, returning the Owner of this piece.
      Pos getPosition()
      A Getter-method, returning the Pos of this piece.
      abstract Pos[] getPossibleMoves(boolean advancedSearch)
      A method to calculate all possible moves, the piece can make at the current moment.
      protected abstract void triggerEvent(Pos target)
      This method will trigger any additional data-manipulations, needed after moving this piece.

      An internal Setter-method to update the Pos of this piece.

    • Method Detail

      • getPossibleMoves

        public abstract Pos[] getPossibleMoves(boolean advancedSearch)
        A method to calculate all possible moves, the piece can make at the current moment.
        Parameters:
        advancedSearch - If this boolean is set to true, the method will filter out all moves, that will put yourself in a check-situation.
        Returns:
        A Pos-array of all possible moves.

      • triggerEvent

        protected abstract void triggerEvent(Pos target)
        This method will trigger any additional data-manipulations, needed after moving this piece.
        Parameters:
        target - The target-Pos, that the piece has moved to.

      • equals

        public abstract boolean equals(Piece piece)
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to compare to
        Returns:
        true if equal, else false
        See Also:
        Object.equals(Object)

      • clone

        public abstract Piece clone()
        Returns an identical copy of this Object.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

        public Player getOwner()
        A Getter-method, returning the Owner of this piece.
        Returns:

        public Pos getPosition()
        A Getter-method, returning the Pos of this piece.
        Returns:
        myPosition

      • updatePosition

        protected void updatePosition(Pos position)
        An internal Setter-method to update the Pos of this piece.
        Parameters:
        position - The new position.
